function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Traveling for work-related activities increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","Impact":"Unnecessary travel can lead to the spread of contagious diseases, posing a health risk to individuals and communities.","Mitigation":"Utilize video calls and digital means for meetings/events, and limit physical travel to essential purposes only.","Technologies":"Video conferencing, digital communication tools.","People":"Business travelers, local communities, coworkers.","Owner":"Organizations, individuals."},{"Description":"Imported items and perishable foodstuffs are likely to be transported by air, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases.","Impact":"Air transportation of goods contributes to the potential spread of contagious diseases across borders and regions.","Mitigation":"Promote the purchase of locally sourced and in-season products to reduce air transportation of goods.","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring, local sourcing initiatives.","People":"Consumers, local communities, retailers.","Owner":"Retailers, government bodies."},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for local cultural and religious practices during travel increases the risk of cultural transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Disregarding local cultural practices can lead to the transmission of contagious diseases and strain relationships between travelers and local communities.","Mitigation":"Encourage travelers to be sensitive to local customs and practices to minimize the risk of cultural transmission of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Cultural sensitivity training, travel advisory resources.","People":"Travelers, local communities, cultural authorities.","Owner":"Travel agencies, cultural organizations."}]}
